content.text: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup" )

content.text: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained" )

content.text: 0) Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "1/4 cup of butter"@8:25 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@29:44 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@50:61 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Saute green onions in butter until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Saute"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "green onions"@9:21 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-2 "butter"@25:31 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender"@32:44 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Remove from pan, and set aside.
3) In the same skillet, melt 1/2 cup of butter, and saute the crawfish for 5 minutes; set aside.
4) In a large pot over medium heat, combine potato soup, mushroom soup, corn, and cream cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "combine"@36:43 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "potato soup"@44:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mushroom soup"@57:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "corn"@72:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cream cheese"@82:94 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a large pot"@6:17 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium heat"@23:34 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Mix well, and bring to a slow boil.
6) Stir in half-and-half, sauteed green onions, and crawfish.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "sauteed green onions"@26:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "crawfish"@52:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Bring to a low boil, and simmer 5 minutes to blend flavors.
